intro.description: This test requires org.eclipse.ua.tests to be installed (installation steps have been provided).

item.title: Install org.eclipse.ua.tests.
item.description: Skip this step if org.eclipse.ua.tests is installed.

subitem.label: Go to the CVS Repository and check out the projects "org.eclipse.ua.tests" and "org.eclipse.test.performance".
Select File -> Export...
In the Export Wizard, select 'Plug-in Development -> Deployable Plug-ins and Fragments' and click Next.
Check the boxes next to "org.eclipse.ua.tests" and "org.eclipse.test.performance".
In the Destination tab, specify a folder with a copy of Eclipse in it. Click Finish.
Restart the Eclipse workbench.
To ensure a successful installation, go to Help -> About Eclipse SDK and click on "Plug-in Details". In the list that comes up, you should be able to find the "org.eclipse.ua.tests" plug-in.

item.title: Find filtered topics
item.description: Test that topics and subtopics can be filtered.

subitem.label: Launch Help by selecting Help->Help Contents from the menu. You should see a book called "tests" in the bookshelf.
Open the topic "filter" in the book "tests".
Check that there are two subtopics "The plugin org.eclipse.help is installed"
Check that there are two subtopics "This topic should always appear"
Check that there are two subtopics "The product org.eclipse.sdk.ide is running"
Check that there are two subtopics "The activity org.eclipse.javaDevelopment is enabled"
Check that there are two subtopics "The category org.eclipse.categories.developmentCategory is enabled"
Check there are no subtopics with "invalid" in the title
Check that there is a line "The plugin org.eclipse.help is installed"
Check that there is a line "The product org.eclipse.sdk.ide is running"
Check that there is a line "The activity org.eclipse.javaDevelopment is enabled"
Check that there a line "The category org.eclipse.categories.developmentCategory is enabled"
Check there is no line containing the word with "invalid"

item.title: Search for word
item.description: Search for a word in the XHTML doc. It should show up as a potential hit.
